alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 10:01PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Harding County through 1030 PM MDT... At 1001 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Camp Crook, or 25 miles west of Buffalo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Harding County, west of Buffalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
